body_html:
Hi,
Thank you for your help.

I have rebased ("git pull") and I have rebuilt again, but I am afraid I have more errors than before.
Also, this time I have the error below
/MatrixBase.h(472): fatal error C1060: insufficient heap space in compiler

I have faced this last error before, when I was building the tensorflow library with GPU, however it works fine building it for CPU.
I am not sure if the issue is related with cmake or GPU. But, it seems some people have been able to build the library for GPU. Do you have any suggestion. I would be appreciated any help.

Note:
mrry, The link you added it doesn´t worked. Could it be possible to added here ?

Thanks in advance.

body:
Hi,
Thank you for your help.

I have rebased ("git pull") and I have rebuilt again, but I am afraid I have more errors than before.
Also, this time I have the error below
/MatrixBase.h(472): fatal error C1060: insufficient heap space in compiler

I have faced this last error before,  when I was building the tensorflow library with GPU, however it works fine building it for CPU.
I am not sure if the issue is related with cmake or GPU. But, it seems some people have been able to build the library for GPU. Do you have any suggestion. I would be appreciated any help.

Note:
mrry, The link you added it doesn´t worked. Could it be possible to added here ?

Thanks in advance.
